comments.body:
Please add a `license_file`. If one is not distributed with the source distribution on pypi, please include it manually:

https://conda-forge.org/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually

and consider including it in future releases upstream.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@  home: https://github.com/tlambert03/tifffolder
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Easily parse/access a subset of data from a folder of TIFFs'
